Screenwriter: Michael Elliot, Rick Famuyiwa, Michael Elliot
Sound Mix: Surround, Dolby SR, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Dolby Stereo
Synopsis: Sidney (Sanaa Lathan) and Dre (Taye Diggs) can attribute their friendship and the launch of their careers to one single childhood instant ... witnessing the birth of hip-hop on a New York street corner. Now some 15 years later, she is a revered music critic and he is a successful, though unfulfilled, music executive. Both come to realize that their true life passions will only be fulfilled by remembering what they learned that day on the corner.
Title: Brown Sugar
